description:
Stella Maris is amazingly good, so KiRaRe decides to sneak onto the main campus for a little reconnaissance. However, the idol group Tetrarkhia has the same idea!
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Sentouryoku ga Dondon Joushou Shite Iru
Their Power Levels Are Rapidly Increasing
戦闘力がどんどん上昇している
